text:
PROJECT INNOVATE
March 13, 1967
The Honorable Alan Bible
U. S. Senator from Nevada
Senate Office Building
Washington, D. C. 20025
Dear Senator Bible:
I want to thank you for the time you took from your busy schedule to discuss the
educational television legislation due to come before the Senate in the near
future.
I was happy to note that you are so enthusiastic about educational television and
I am confident that this bill will be given your fullest consideration. Should you
have any questions or wish further information about the bill, please feel free
to call the National Association of Educational Broadcasters, 1346 Connecticut
Avenue, telephone 667-6000, an'd they will be happy to help you.
Thank you again and I look forward to meeting you again sometime in the future.
Sincerely,
HELENA. SIDLER (Miss), Coordinator
Research and Development
HASreli
C L A R
COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT - TELEPHONE 736-50
-2832 EAST FLA
NGO ROAD - LAS
EGAS. NEVADA
